name: Rains | Birchard Marketing
description:
Founded in 1987, Rains | Birchard Marketing is a full-service marketing firm headquartered in Portland, Oregon. 
We pride ourselves on delivering value to our clients through our creativity and a dedication to partnering with our clients.  Experience has shown that we can help build businesses, not just make a marketing piece pretty.
We are also an energetic and committed team of professionals that are fun to work with.
